name: Tooongue
description:
In this short game you play as a frog. Make precise jumps, use your tongue to pull the crates. The tongue mechanic is the "joined together" mechanic.

Submitted to the GMTK 2021 Gamejam. Made in less than 48 hours. It's my first Jam so do not expect much.

I've restricted myself to use only the Pico-8 color palette and the NES resolution.
